greeting.text: Hello! How can I help you today?
Hi there! What can I do for you?
Good to see you! How may I assist?

farewell.text: See you later! Come back anytime.
Farewell! It was nice chatting with you.

thanks.text: Always here if you need me!

help.text: I can help you with several things! Ask me about the weather, time, jokes, facts, or just chat with me.
I'm a chatbot that can tell you the weather, time, jokes, facts, and have a basic conversation. How can I assist you today?
Sure! Let me know what you need help with.

weather_query.text: Let me check that for you! ${weather_info}

conditions.text: Currently, I can't fetch real-time weather, but if I could, I'd tell you the weather in ${location}.

weather_query.text: Could you specify a location? That way, I can fetch weather data for you.

weather_forecast.text: I currently can't predict the weather, but if I could, I’d give you tomorrow's forecast!

name_query.text: My name is ChattyBot! How can I assist you today?

introduce_user.text: Nice to meet you, ${user_name}! How can I assist you today?

deny_name.text: I apologize for the misunderstanding. What is your name?

joke_request.text: Why don’t scientists trust atoms? Because they make up everything!
Why did the scarecrow win an award? Because he was outstanding in his field!
I told my wife she was drawing her eyebrows too high. She looked surprised!
What do you call a fake noodle? An impasta!

fact_request.text: A group of flamingos is called a 'flamboyance'.
Honey never spoils. Archaeologists found honey in Egyptian tombs that’s over 3,000 years old and still edible.
The shortest war in history was between Britain and Zanzibar in 1896. Zanzibar surrendered after 38 minutes.
A day on Venus is longer than a year on Venus. It takes 243 Earth days to rotate once, but only 225 days to orbit the Sun.

fallback.text: I'm sorry, I didn't quite get that. Could you rephrase or ask something else?
I'm not sure what you mean. Try asking about the weather, time, jokes, or facts!
I didn't catch that. Could you try asking in a different way?
